examples.example: 去年我去了很多美丽的地方，拓宽了自己的眼界。

translate.english: Last year I went to many beautiful places and broadened my horizons.

examples.example: 去年的经历让我收获了满满的成长和珍贵的回忆。

translate.english: Last year's experience made me gain full growth and precious memories.

examples.example: 去年通过自己的努力，我实现了一个又一个小目标，感到特别充实和快乐。

translate.english: Last year, through my own efforts, I achieved one small goal after another and felt particularly fulfilling and happy.
